SEARCH
Package fidelity

Class BasicCard

java.lang.Object
fidelity.FidelityCard
fidelity.BasicCard
public class BasicCard extends FidelityCard
Represents a basic fidelity card for a customer in the Foodora system.

The BasicCard does not provide any reduction or special benefits on orders. It serves as the default fidelity card type for customers.

Author:
Aymane Adib

  • Method Details

    • orderReduction

      public double orderReduction(Order order)
      Returns the reduction applied to the order by the BasicCard. Since BasicCard offers no reduction, this always returns 0.
      Specified by:
      orderReduction in class FidelityCard
      Parameters:
      order - the order for which the reduction is calculated
      Returns:
      0, as no reduction is applied

    • getFinalPrice

      public double getFinalPrice(Order order)
      Calculates the final price for the given order using the BasicCard. Since BasicCard offers no reduction, it simply returns the original order price.
      Specified by:
      getFinalPrice in class FidelityCard
      Parameters:
      order - the order for which the final price is calculated
      Returns:
      the original price of the order

    • toString

      Returns a string representation of the BasicCard object.
      Overrides:

      Returns:
